title: Butter Fried Rice 😋 | No Sauce Fried Rice| Healthy Diet| Kids
content:
Main course: Rice variety : Butter Fried Rice 🍚 Servings: 4 Duration: 15 mins Healthy diet means eating healthy food such as leafy vegetables, nuts and fruits. It also includes to avoid junk food and more probably frozen food, sauces, oils - in oil it again divides into two saturated fat and unsaturated fat.. In saturated fat it produces good amount of fat such as coconut oil, butter, dark chocolate 🍫 , dairy products etc., why am I explaining all these because today the meal which I prepared is No Sauce and Butter Fried Rice You doesn't know how it turned out without sauces such a lovely color loaded with freshly chopped vegetables and cooked rice tossed in butter.. yummy 😋 Today, I prepared Butter fried rice with vegetables and not included sauce/ vinegar to make it more healthier, I hope you like it. Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cooked Basmati Rice - 240 gms
  • Carrot - 1 medium - finely chopped
  • Green bell pepper / Capsicum - 1 medium - finely chopped
  • Cabbage - chopped - 200 gms
  • Cauliflower florets - 15-20
  • Spring onion greens - 1/4 cup - finely chopped
  • Red paprika - 1/2 tb sp
  • Garam masala powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Fine black pepper powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly flakes - 1 tsp
  • Butter - 2 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat skillet pan or wok over medium heat
  • Add butter, let it melt
  • Add chopped carrot , Capsicum, cabbage and cauliflower
  • Saute 2 mins
  • Add salt, pepper powder, red paprika, red chilly flakes, Garam Masala Powder
  • Mix well and saute one more minute
  • Add cooked rice and gently mix or toss wok
  • Saute 2 mins and turn off heat
  • Serve hot topped with spring onion greens
  • Happy Cooking and Enjoy your day
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Vegetables you can customize on your taste and choice and spices too
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • If you would like to add sauces, include them while sautéing spices and next rice..
  • Serve Butter fried rice topped with spring green onion and lemon juice 🙂
